about_the_game: UntitledShooterGame incorporates standard 5v5 like gameplay as well as various modes such as Deathmatch, Defusal, and Prop Hunt. USG uses Peer-To-Peer multiplayer which essentially means there are no dedicated servers, and instead the host of the game is the server, which means it will provide low ping if all players are in the same region. It is recommended to play this game with your friends for the best experience, or alternatively you can play with the AI bots. Join the discord to stay up to date with updates such as new maps, weapons, DLC and more. (Gameplay snapshots coming to store soon)
detailed_description: UntitledShooterGame incorporates standard 5v5 like gameplay as well as various modes such as Deathmatch, Defusal, and Prop Hunt. USG uses Peer-To-Peer multiplayer which essentially means there are no dedicated servers, and instead the host of the game is the server, which means it will provide low ping if all players are in the same region. It is recommended to play this game with your friends for the best experience, or alternatively you can play with the AI bots. Join the discord to stay up to date with updates such as new maps, weapons, DLC and more. (Gameplay snapshots coming to store soon)
name: UntitledShooterGame

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any standard sound card.
  • Additional Notes: Uses V-Sync by default
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-12900F or AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any high-definition audio card.
  • Additional Notes: Uses V-Sync by default

short_description: I have been working on this game for roughly 2 years now and I am planning to release early 2025 so make sure to wishlist! Details about USG are in the description below. All the support is greatly appreciated and I hope you all enjoy the game! (Gameplay snapshots coming to store page soon)
